content: this is a really simple pattern consisting of chains single_crochet double_crochet and triple crochets the yarn you use ist flexible only make sure the length from row 1 is ok with you sizing the amount of chains in row one defines the length of the top the length of the finished top is 1/2 of the length of row 1 the repeat of the pattern defines the width of the top **left side of top ** * row 1 start with chain i always do a single_crochet chain of 193 stitches turn * other sizes & lengths chain the length you want but it always needs to be a multiple of 4 and then add 1 more stitch e g 48 * 4+1 =193 -> this defines the length of the top adjust this to the length of the top that you want * * row 2 crochet 193 single_crochet if you did a chain of single_crochet at the start or double crochets if you did a simple chain in row 1 into the chain just made turn * row 3 chain 4+3 = first treble_crochet & chain space *skip 3 stitches treble_crochet 4th stitch from last treble_crochet chain 3* repeat from * to* until end of row turn * row 4 chain 4+2 = first treble_crochet & chain space skip 2 stitches * treble_crochet 3th stitch from last stitch chain 3* repeat from * to* until end of row turn * row 5 repeat row 3 * row 6 chain 3 double_crochet in all stitches of the last row turn * row 7 - repeat row 3-6 three more times * = you then have 12 treble_crochet row and 4 double_crochet row + first two row note if you do more or less repeats the top will me more narrow or have longer sleeves* **right side of top ** * crochet right side of top same as left side **finish your work** * **join sides and leave head hole** join both sides use the last row as its the prettiest starting on the start of the row with a slip_stitch until about 1/3 so at least your head fits through repeat joining from the other side of the piece * **armholes** similar to the middle seam create the arm seam by slip stitching this time you stich the same side on itself closing about 1/4th of the seam repeat on other side * **finish garment ** by adding a row of double crochets around the bottom of the top start anywhere with 3 chains always double_crochet 4 into the triple crochet spaces and 3 double crochets into the double crochets * weave in loose ends * done let me know if you have any questions or issues with the pattern
